short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ideal extension for virtual games - roll the dice, flip a coin, draw a card, and pick random numbers feature

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simulates the feeling of playing a classic board game in person, while still staying virtual.  To go along with your virtual board game, you will need a random dice roll or coin toss - and this extension has it: all in one place, and all for free.
